overview: Firefall -- a well-respected country band whose heyday was in the 1970s -- drew on country traditions and infused them with some choice melancholy rock overtones. If you're a fan of Buffalo Springfield and The Eagles, you'll love this video. And for those who already are fans of the band, this video is a wonderful aural &NFi;and&NFi_; visual treat. Here, the band reforms after 20 years and delivers a set that underscores the beauty of their soulful tunes.
title: Rock 'n' Roll Greats: Firefall
